app

Class Activities

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.Activities

  • public class Activities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides 4 possible activities for accounts: 1 - create an account, 2 - deposit, 3 - withdraw, 4 - transfer between accounts.
    Since:
    2015-11-12
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Keira Zhou

      Activities()

      Deposit Money to a given account.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Account create(int type)
        Create an account.

        This method creates either a checking account or a saving account.

        Parameters:
        type - Integer indicating whether 1-Checking or 2-Saving.
        Returns:
        an Account object.

      • depositTo

        public static boolean depositTo(Account account,
                                Money amount)
        Deposit Money to a given account.
        Parameters:
        account - Account where money will be deposited.
        amount - Deposit amount.

      • withdrawFrom

        public static boolean withdrawFrom(Account account,
                                   Money amount)
        Withdraw Money to a given account.
        Parameters:
        account - Account where money will be withdrew.
        amount - Withdraw amount.

      • transfer

        public static boolean transfer(Account from,
                               Account to,
                               Money amount)
        Transfer Money between two accounts.
        Parameters:
        from - Account where money will be transfered from.
        to - Account where money will be transfered to.
        amount - Transfer amount.
